response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, so don't miss out on the chance to experience the difference it can make in your life.", "product_price": 150}
